# threshold(to:)

**Instance Method**

Adds an element-wise round operation to the current graph.

## Declaration

```swift
func threshold(to lowerBound: Float) -> BNNSGraph.Builder.Tensor<T>
```

## Parameters

- **lowerBound**: The lower bound.
